longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry must be
  valid for the period of intended stay.
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission refused to holders of non-biometric passports
  issued to nationals of Macedonia (FYROM).

Visa Issuance:
Visa required, except for Nationals of Macedonia (FYROM) can
obtain a visa on arrival for a max. stay of 1 month. Fee:
varies between USD 40.- and USD 100.-
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, exclusively due to P.
  vivax, exists from June through October in areas bordering
  Tajikistan and Uzbekistan (Batken, Jalal-Abad and Osh
  regions) and in the outskirts of Bishkek. Recommended
  prevention: A.
